title.rendered: How to fold your e-bike, step by step

content.rendered:
How to fold your e-bike, step by step

TRILIX
support & maintenance


  1. Release the secure lever by pulling upward
  2. Fold the e-bike to the left
  3. Lock the secure lever by pushing it downward
  4. Release and fold the handlebar
  5. Secure the handlebar to the frame
  6. Keeping the pedals parallel to the frame push and roll the e-bike by the seat
